hero.title: Common Interview Questions
hero.subTitle: Practice Some Of The Most Common Interview Questions

discover.title: Explore Some of The Most Common Interview Questions Our Team Provides:
discover.subTitle: Be Prepared For The Tough Questions That They Might Ask.

blocks.title: Why do you think you are a great candidate for this position?
blocks.content: Explore some of the most common questions asked in an interview.

blocks.title: Describe some of your strengths and how you apply them in your work?
blocks.content: It is important to present yourself in a professional manner, take a look at some of the helpful resources we recommend.

blocks.title: What is your greatest weakness and how do you plan to overcome this weakness?
blocks.content: Confidence is key to succeeding in your career. Explore the resources our team has compiled to ensure your confidence isn't what is holding you back from the career growth you desire.

blocks.title: What are your career goals, and how do you see yourself excelling from this position?
blocks.content: It is important to know Information listed on your resume and how to respond to questions regarding your experience. Take a look at some of the recommendations we have for helping you follow up questions about specific sections of your resume.

blocks.title: Describe some of the responsibilities you were given at your last position?
blocks.content: Problem Solving and Leadership Examples are key to successful interviews. Explore the ways we recommend to respond to these tough questions here.

blocks.title: How would you add value to our current team?
blocks.content: We recommend that individuals avoid saying these things during an interview. Hiring managers and people listening to you say interviewers who avoid these habits provide a more enjoyable experience.

blocks.title: How do you work under pressure?
blocks.content: Lets talk about the ways you help  bring out the best in you. Explore the steps and recommendations our team has compiled to help bring out core strengths skill-sets during an interview.

blocks.title: Tell Us About A Time You Were Asked To Make A Hard Decision?
blocks.content: Some qualities and traits are important and stand out during the interview process. Take a look at what qualities we believe stand out to hiring managers.

blocks.title: Tell Me About A Time You Failed, and what did you learn from it?
